reviews.review: Oyun artık zivanadan çıkmış derecede prime hesapların karşısına prime olmayan hile hesaplar geliyo ayrıca herkesin güven faktörü yüksek olduğuna rağmen hile gelmesi nasıl oluyo anlamıyorum bu soruna bir çözüm bulun lütfen onların yüzünden rank düşüyoruz yükselemiyoruzda maçlarımızda silinmiyor.
A really nice game and fun to play with friends, the only negative part about this game is the cheater.. i hate them, Valve should improve their anti-cheat system
Only play this with friends, otherwise it's not worth.
As long as you get the right kind of people to play with this game really shines, otherwise its very bland and generic.
Cheaters everywhere :) Even in prime game.
ce jeux est juste super je kiff même si c'est dur pour monter en grade
its good but the cheaters are very big problem

I love this game but the new ranking system is a complete joke. So youre unranked, win 2 games within 24 hours and get a 20+ hour ban so they can analyze your win? How the hell is that not just a stupid joke. I am a bit at loss of words over this. Now it takes foreeeeever to get a rank. Just ridiculous...
shit game i have to keep carrying and i still lose
even im a noob, ilove it xD

с этой игрой ты становишься геем, даже если у тебя есть девушка, потому что ебать в очко тебя будут каждый час и после определенного времени тебе начинает это нравиться, сейчас я смотрю на мужчин с опреденным интересом. СПАСИБО ГЕЙБ,сыграв еще 18 часов ебали не меня, а я ебал уже я. И сука это тоже прикольно!
делаю вывод - игра для геев, решение не подлежит обжалованию

It's hard to have fun in a game, when everybody is so hell bent in winning that it's just serious toxic people, every day.

It's a game, not real life. Toxic cheating community, getting screamed at for making mistakes and voted to be kicked. I never said I was good at CS:GO, I play it for an escape, not to be berated.

At the higher tiers, this game is unforgiving and just not fun.
Counter-Strike is like roulette, it's fun until it gets russian.
good game but if you dont have prime its just hvh if you like the game i would recomend investing in prime.
I am writing this , beceause Ihave dead trust factor and i need to make some badges to get better trust factor to escape from cheaters house. Good Luck !
great strategy teambased game excpet for the toxic people and hackers but other than that its good
Эта игра просто прекрасно я так ее обожаю, особенно из за токсиков в ней)
No jak ma się znajomych do grania to nawet spoko ale samemu bym się na śmierć zanudził
Неплохая игра, вообще не затягивает, Смоук сити, флеш лонг
